Action.author: wlahti
Action.body: ~manish-sethi Can you take a look at this one?

Action.author: manish-sethi
Action.body: "panic: Error opening leveldb: resource temporarily unavailable" the most likely reason of this error typically is when you try to run the peer instance with a ledger dir that is already in use by other peer instance. In other words, trying to run more than one peer instances with the same ledger folder.

Action.author: nn77
Action.body: Hello. Well, I do not have access to environment where that problem appeared. So I could not provide any information anymore. :(
